EN: Insufficient currency!
CN: 您的货币用光啦!

EN: Insufficient resources!
CN: 您的资源用光啦!

EN: Insufficient gems!
CN: 您的钻石用光啦!

EN: Insufficient gold!
CN: 您的金币用光啦!

EN: You still don't have a Townhall,  go and build one!
CN: 您还没有指挥所呢, 快去建造一个吧!

EN: Your Townhall isn't at the required level,  I suggest you go and upgrade it first.
CN: 您的指挥所尚未达到所需等级, 建议先进行升级.

EN: You do not have enough Power Points,  I suggest you increase your power first.
CN: 您的实力值不足, 建议先进行实力提升.

EN: You cannot move the target.
CN: 不能对目标进行移动.

EN: Surely you don't wish to attack yourself!
CN: 咦, 您难道要攻打自身土地?

EN: You cannot attack allies who have already been rescued or those who have a "free" status.
CN: 抬头不见低头见, 您可不能攻击自由人状态下或者已被解救的盟友啊.

EN: Acquiring underling is no easy feat,  you should treat them well!
CN: 获得一个下属不容易, 要善待别人哦~!

EN: You may not like it,  but you cannot attack your superior players!
CN: 虽然可能不情愿, 可是您不能攻打上属玩家哦~!

EN: Target cannot be reached.
CN: 无法到达这个目标.

EN: The tile you are looking for cannot be found!
CN: 您所寻找的土地不存在~!

EN: This player cannot be found on Misty Island
CN: 迷雾之岛中没有找到这个玩家.

EN: This ID already exists
CN: 玩家ID重复

EN: This player name already exists
CN: 玩家名称重复

EN: Join request not found
CN: 加入请求不存在

EN: This Alliance has either disbanded or doesn't exist.
CN: 这个联盟已被解散或不存在.

EN: This Alliance ID already exists.
CN: 联盟ID重复

EN: This name is already being used,  please choose another one!
CN: 这个名字已经被使用, 起一个新的吧!

EN: This Alliance is already overpopulated,  there are better choices out there!
CN: 这个联盟已人满为患, 还有更好的选择哦~!

EN: This Alliance has refused to accept new members.
CN: 该联盟已拒绝接受新盟友加入.

EN: Requirements to join the Alliance invalid
CN: 联盟加入条件非法

EN: Alliance member not found.
CN: 没找到这个盟友.

EN: Alliance member's position not found.
CN: 没找到这个盟友的职务.

EN: This Alliance has already entered a state of abdication.
CN: 此联盟已经进入禅让状态.

EN: An Alliance leader cannot leave an Alliance until all of the members have left.
CN: 在联盟成员全部离开之前, 盟主不能退出联盟.

EN: Alliance marks have reached the limit,  please sort this out and try again.
CN: 联盟标记已达上限, 请整理后重试.

EN: Construction master Sirri has discovered some flaws in the building,  he is carrying out some urgent repairs
CN: 建造师小思睿发现该建筑有瑕疵, 正在快速修复.

EN: Cannot cancel this build.
CN: 不能取消次此次建造.

EN: You must build on tile which you own and which is of the requisite level.
CN: 要建造在自己拥有, 并且等级合适的土地上.

EN: The builders are currently busy building,  please wait until they have finished to build again.
CN: 两个建筑队列都已经在工作啦, 请您等此次建造完成后再做打算.

EN: This march has either been completed or hasn't yet begun.
CN: 已成功派遣.

EN: March event type invalid
CN: 行军事件类型非法.

EN: March event either completed or yet to begin.
CN: 行军事件已完成或未开始.

EN: You cannot march to here
CN: 该地点无法到达.

EN: This Unit cannot carry out the operation.
CN: 不能指派该部队执行操作.

EN: This hero is already in a Unit.
CN: 该英雄已经在一支部队中了.

EN: This position is already occupied
CN: 该位置已经被占用.

EN: You cannot appoint a hero in this position.  The formation is either full or said position is already occupied.
CN: 该位置不能指派英雄, 上阵人数已满或者位置已经被占用.

EN: Hero not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 该英雄不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: The Strength of the Hero(es) in the Unit is insufficient,  you must wait until the Strength has been recovered before you can move.
CN: 部队中有英雄体力不足, 需要等待体力恢复后再进行移动.

EN: Hero level data error,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 英雄等级数据错误, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Hero name invalid,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 英雄名称非法, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Insufficient hero fragments.
CN: 英雄碎片不足.

EN: The Unit count has reached the highest value,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 英雄生命值均已达到最大值或均已在治疗.

EN: Skill not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 该技能不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Battle report not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 该战报不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Personal message not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 该私信不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: System message not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 系统消息不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Building not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 建筑不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Building name invalid,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 建筑名称非法, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Building level data error,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 建筑等级数据错误, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Building has been demolished,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 建筑已经被摧毁, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Construction,  do not repeat the construction.
CN: 建造中, 请勿重复建造.

EN: Building locked,  please read the building information.
CN: 还未解锁该建筑, 请阅读建筑信息.

EN: Building positioned
CN: 建筑已经放置.

EN: Task reward has already been claimed.
CN: 任务奖励已经领取.

EN: Task hasn't been completed.
CN: 任务还未完成.

EN: Task not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 任务不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Task reward has already been claimed.
CN: 任务奖励已经领取.

EN: Task hasn't been completed.
CN: 任务还未完成.

EN: Task not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 任务不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Treasure Chest not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 该宝箱不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Treasure Map Fragments not fully collected.
CN: 藏宝图碎片还没有搜集全.

EN: Treasure Map reward not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 藏宝图奖励不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Tribute name error,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 贡品名称错误, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: The next batch of Tributes is being delivered,  please be patient.
CN: 下一批贡品正在运送中, 请耐心等待.

EN: Server already full,  please choose another server to play on.
CN: 服务器已满员, 请选择其他服务器进行游戏.

EN: This tile has already been occupied by another player.
CN: 该地块已被其他玩家占领.

EN: You has already joined an Alliance.
CN: 您已加入一个联盟.

EN: You have only just left an Alliance.  Only after 24 hours of leaving an Alliance can you join another one.
CN: {0}后才可以再次加入联盟.

EN: You have been annexed,  you cannot join an Alliance.  Try to save yourself or request help from friends and allies.
CN: 您正处于沦陷状态, 不能加入联盟. 请尝试自救或者呼唤盟友解救.

EN: Your current level does not permit you to carry out this operation.
CN: 您所在的公会级别不能进行这个操作.

EN: You have just kicked someone out of the Alliance.  Elders can only kick one person out every 30 minutes.
CN: 您才刚刚踢出一名成员, 长老级别每30分钟才能踢出一人.

EN: You cannot kick this player out of the Alliance.
CN: 您无法将该玩家踢出联盟.

EN: The Alliance mark can only be modified once every 2 minutes,  please be patient.
CN: 联盟标记每2分钟可以更改一次, 请耐心等待.

EN: You cannot add an Alliance mark.
CN: 您不能添加联盟标记.

EN: Unit not found,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 部队不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Unit currently marching.
CN: 部队正在行军.

EN: Heros are getting healing.
CN: 部队英雄正在治疗.

EN: Unit already on the map,  please restart the game and try again.
CN: 部队已经存在于地图上, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: Units can only be Healed at the Townhall,  Stronghold or in the City.
CN: 部队只能在指挥所, 要塞和城市中治疗.

CN: 要塞治疗队列已满.

EN: Your attack target is under protection
CN: 目标正处于48小时新手保护状态, 不能攻击.

EN: You have already claimed this Chest!
CN: 您已经领取过这个宝箱啦!

EN: Your input has exceeded the limit,  it cannot be longer than 16 characters.
CN: 输入长度超过限制, 不能超过16个字.

EN: Your input has exceeded the limit,  it cannot be longer than 100 characters.
CN: 输入长度超过限制, 不能超过100个字.

EN: Your input has exceeded the limit,  it cannot be longer than 400 characters.
CN: 输入长度超过限制, 不能超过400个字.

EN: Please communicate and behave in a civilized and respectful manner.
CN: 请您文明用语, 和谐的进行游戏.

EN: Event does not exist or has been finished.
CN: 治疗事件不存在或已完成.

EN: Unit treatment not found
CN: 治疗部队不能存在.

EN: Recipient doesn't exist,  please type it in again.
CN: 收件人不存在, 请重新输入.

EN: Building cannot be abandoned.
CN: 建筑不能放弃.

EN: You cannot abandon this piece of tile.
CN: 免战保护期间不能放弃土地.

EN: The tile you wish to abandon does not exist, please restart the game and try again.
CN: 您想要放弃的土地不存在, 请重启游戏再次尝试.

EN: This Chest has not been unlocked.
CN: 该宝箱未解锁.

EN: This Chest has already been used,  opened or not found.
CN: 该宝箱已用被打开过或不存在.

EN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1} was annexed by my Alliance
CN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}被我盟沦陷

EN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1} has paid resource levies,  and has contributed {2} Expr Points to the Alliance.
CN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}上交了资源, 为我盟贡献{2}点联盟实力值.

EN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1} has paid resource levies and is no longer a underling of our Alliance.
CN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}缴齐了资源, 不再是我盟下属.

EN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}was rescued by<size=24><color=#EF0723>{2}</color></size>{3},  and isn't our underling anymore.
CN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}被<size=24><color=#EF0723>{2}</color></size>{3}解救, 不再是我盟下属.

EN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}was annexed by<size=24><color=#EF0723>{2}</color></size>{3},  and isn't our underling anymore.
CN: <size=24><color=#D5CD00>{0}</color></size>{1}被<size=24><color=#EF0723>{2}</color></size>{3}沦陷, 已不再是我盟下属.

EN: Alliance be disbanded
CN: 联盟不能解散

EN: Whilst being annexed a target cannot be moved
CN: 在被沦陷期间不能对目标进行移动

EN: Annexation Info
CN: 沦陷信息

EN: I regret to inform you that you have been annexed by player {0} and have become a underling under Alliance {1}.  You currently cannot benefit from Alliance buffs or move to Alliance territories.
CN: 很遗憾, 您被玩家{0}攻陷, 成为联盟{1}的下属. 暂时不能享受联盟加成也不能借地移动.

EN: Annexation Removal Info
CN: 解除沦陷信息

EN: Player {0} saved you,  from now on you will no longer be a underling under Alliance {1}.
CN: 玩家{0}解救了您, 从此不再是联盟{1}的下属.

EN: Annexation Removal Info
CN: 解除沦陷信息

EN: Congratulations for having paid off enough resources,  you will no longer be a underling under Alliance {0}.
CN: 恭喜您已经缴纳足够资源, 不再是联盟{0}的下属.

EN: Alliance Info
CN: 联盟信息

EN: Your Alliance application has been approved by player {0},  congratulations on becoming a member of Alliance {1}.
CN: 您的联盟申请已被玩家{0}通过, 恭喜您成为联盟{1}的一员.

EN: Need to log in again.
CN: 需要重新登录

CN: 暂时不能编辑部队

CN: 暂时不能返回部队

EN: Name existed.  Try a new one!
CN: 这个名字已经被用啦, 换个新的吧.

CN: 请文明用语, 换个新的名字吧.

CN: 边境被其打通之前, 不能跨国加入该联盟.

[活动]七天登录好礼, 送森林游侠

你好, 亲爱的冒险者! 随着冒险旅程的起航, 精彩的开服活动也将为尊敬的冒险家助力. 感谢您为抵抗恶魔势力做出的贡献, 期待您拯救这片支离破碎的迷雾大陆. 这也是迷雾大陆冒险者公会应该给您的帮助.

[活动]七天登录送森林游侠
自游戏开服起, 每日登录游戏均可获取丰厚奖励! 累计登录七天更有豪礼相送!
第一天: 钻石*10 金币*100
第二天: 钻石*10 金币*125 卡牌-[亚马逊角斗士]*5
第三天: 钻石*10 金币*150
第四天: 钻石*10 金币*175
第五天: 钻石*10 金币*200
第六天: 钻石*10 金币*300
第七天: 钻石*10 金币*500 卡牌-[森林游侠]*15

祝家园繁荣昌盛!
        ——迷雾大陆冒险者公会
